comm: and India are away, Rohit leans forward to a length ball and clips it through midwicket for a couple, that pitched outside off and angled into the right-hander

a full ball this time, Hazlewood is looking for swing, Rohit loves that and he leans forward to drive the half-volley wide of mid-on, Faulkner gives chase and dives headfirst near the boundary to try and save the four but he can't
short of a length outside off, a bit of seam movement away from the right-hander, Rohit lets it go this time
a poor ball, full and on the pads, Rohit misses the glance but the ball brushes the pads and goes to the fine leg boundary ... no swing by the looks of it
a length delivery outside off, Rohit presses forward and opens the face to steer the ball to third man
good length just outside off to the left-hander from over the wicket, Dhawan strides forward and shoulders arms. India will be really pleased with that first over
an loud appeal for lbw first up! Rohit leans forward and across and toe ends a blockhole delivery into the leg side, the Aussies thought that hit the pad but it was the bottom of the bat
full length outside off, Dhawan leans forward and square drives to point
133 kph, the length is full and there is width outside off - again no swing - Dhawan gets on to the front foot and cover drives, he hits it into the gap but the timing is not great
131 kph, good length just outside off from over the wicket, a bit of extra bounce after Dhawan covers his off stump and shoulders arms
he's timed this cover drive not not placed it in the gap, Dhawan came forward and gave it a real thump
strays on to the pads but Dhawan fails to connect with the front foot glance, the ball goes off the pads to the keeper

edged and over the keeper! That short ball climbed on Rohit as he shaped to play the pull of the back foot, the ball got very big on him and he got a top edge that was just enough to take the ball over the leaping Wade
played off the pads through square leg, a good length on a wicket to wicket line
good length outside off, the ball holds its line after pitching and beats the outside edge of Rohit Sharma's front foot push
a fuller ball, still looking for the swing that isn't there, Rohit leans forward and drives towards mid off
short of a length outside off, played off the back foot towards point
good length angling towards off stump, Rohit strides forward and blocks with a straight bat
the good length ball skids into Dhawan from over the wicket, he tries to hit the ball off the front foot through the leg side but gets an inside edge on to the pad
131 kph but the skiddiness of the deliveries make it seem quicker, Dhawan stays in his crease and uses the angle into him to play the ball towards midwicket
leans forward to a fuller ball that angles across him from over the wicket and drives into the covers
the Indians at the WACA make themselves heard again as Rohit swivels on the front foot to a short ball and pulls it far over the backward square leg boundary
good length outside off, shaping away from the right-hander, Rohit leans forward and lets it pass
short of a length outside off, really close to the wide line, the umpire says it's too close to the wide line
gets on the back foot and defends with a straight bat
good length outside off, no movement but there's bounce on this pitch, Dhawan lets it go to Wade
good length again, pitching around off and slanting across the left-hander, Dhawan shoulders arms once again
defended on the back foot towards the off side
presses forward and defends on the leg side
just short of a length on leg and middle, Dhawan goes back and plays a short-arm swat to square leg
presses forward and cuts a length ball from outside off behind point
gets on the front foot to a half volley and drives smoothly, Warner is in the way at mid off

shot! Finally Dhawan finds the perfect combination of timing and placement. He got on the front foot to a full ball and drove it firmly through the gap between extra cover and mid off, no one is chasing that down
played towards midwicket off the front foot
a bit off extra bounce from a good length, Rohit goes back as the ball angles across him and takes his bottom hand off the bat as he plays the ball towards third man
what's happened there? An appeal, for lbw I think, but I think he inside edged that. the ball squeezed between bat and body and just missed the stumps. That delivery cut back into the left-hander
tries to cut but the length is a bit full and the line a bit too close to off stump, gets beaten on the bottom edge
a length ball on middle and leg, Rohit moves across his crease and tucks the ball off his hips behind square
stays back and opens the face to play a short of a length ball towards point
that good length ball angles away Dhawan from over the wicket and then shapes into him after pitching just outside off, he came forward to hit towards mid on but is beaten between bat and body

he's gone for the hook and he's been caught at long leg! Dhawan was on the front foot, out of the crease in fact, as he tried to hook a short ball that climbed sharply on him. He was cramped for room and could only top edge it towards Marsh, who came running forward and to his left to take the catch
Rohit drops the ball close on the leg side and runs the single
Hazlewood greets Kohli with a sharp bouncer that climbs steeply again, Kohli ducks under it
good length and straight, Rohit defends on the front foot
good length on off stump, defended on the front foot on the off side
leans forward to a fuller ball and drives crisply to mid-off
pushes forward and plays the good length ball towards cover point

a fuller ball, angling wider outside off from over the wicket across the right-hander, Rohit presses forward and plays away from his body, he was trying to drive on the off side but got an outside edge to third man
Kohli moves forward and shoulders arms as the ball angles across him from over the wicket
good length, pitching outside off stump and angling into Rohit, who stays in his crease and defends
good length outside off, left alone by the batsman

short ball, Rohit meets it on the front foot and swivel pulls through square leg, excellent running between the wickets because the fielder at fine leg has to run a long way to his left to get to the ball
good length outside off, the ball takes off after pitching, bouncing sharply. Kohli moves towards the off side and lets it go
moves forward and across his stumps to clip a fuller ball off his pads behind square leg
good length, some extra bounce again, Rohit is cramped for room on the back foot as he defends awkwardly
defended on the back foot on the off side
presses forward to a good length ball and pushes it towards mid off, they think about a single but decide against it
shot! Leans forward and across towards the off side to counter the angle across him from Paris, he then clips the ball neatly against the angle, sending it through midwicket
shot again! Similar to the previous ball, on leg and middle though. Kohli leans forward and across and flick the ball crisply through midwicket, smack out of the middle
good length angling outside the off stump, Kohli lets it pass

steps forward to drive the length ball on the up and punches it uppishly past the bowler, the timing is great though and once the ball passes mid-off the chase was always a difficult one to win, the fielder dives valiantly on the boundary but in vain
a full toss, clipped through midwicket for two, didn't hit that too hard
lousy start from Marsh, another full toss at a friendly height on middle and leg, Rohit puts it away to the midwicket boundary with a controlled flick through the gap
good length just outside off, much better line and length, Rohit defends on the front foot
good length just outside off again, Rohit defends on the front foot with a straight bat
leans forward and across his stumps to flick a full ball from outside off stump towards wide mid-on
moves across his crease towards the off and gently drives a full ball towards wide mid-on again
a good length on off stump, defended on the front foot
134 kph, a good length again, outside off stump, Rohit strides forward and defends on the off side
Paris dives to left at mid on and cuts off Rohit's firm drive off the front foot, saves four runs
pushed gently off the front foot, straight to Paris this time. Boland hits the pitch quite hard, while Paris was skiddier
Rohit pushes forward to defend but the ball straightens off the good length a bit and takes the outside edge along the ground behind point
clipped off the pads through midwicket for a single
shot! A half-volley from Marsh outside off, Kohli meets it on the front foot and drives wide of the fielder at mid-off, outstanding timing
moves forward and across and plays the ball into the leg side in front of midwicket
short ball outside off, Kohli lets it go
short of a length outside off, Kohli moves towards the off side in his crease and lets it pass
short of a length angling into the body, Kohli tucks it off his hips in front of square
short of a length and rising outside off, Rohit rides the bounce, rising on to his toes and playing the ball towards point
a half volley on the pads, full is not the way to go on this pitch, Kohli leans forward and across and flicks the ball between mid-on and midwicket. Head right over the ball, great wrists.
shorter length but on the pads, Kohli leans forward and across and glances to fine leg
pushed off the front foot to midwicket
good length and straight, defended back to the bowler
good length around off, played from the crease on the off side
defended from the crease on the off side
in the blockhole right away, Rohit moves forward and plays it towards mid on
a full toss angling just past off stump, think Rohit was cramped for room on the drive and he tried to hit it a bit too hard, straight to mid off
good length on off stump, Rohit defends on the leg side
full again outside off, Rohit times the drive well but hits it along the ground to long off
shorter length angling across the right hander, played from the crease towards cover point

shot! I dont understand this full length on this pitch, on leg and middle this time. Rohit moves forward and drills the straight drive between the bowler and mid-on, that simply scorched across the outfield
there you go, the length is shorter and the ball rises sharply towards Kohli's left shoulder as he moves towards the off side, he checks his shot and Wade dives to his left to collect
defended from the crease on the leg side
short of a length outside off, Kohli stays back and opens the face to steer the ball to third man
played behind square leg for a single
good length angling into middle stump, leans forward and defends to midwicket
short of a length outside off, left alone by the batsman
good length on a middle and off line, Rohit presses forward and defends
defended on the off side on the front foot
steered off the back foot with the angle across him to third man
defended off the back foot on the off side
leans forward and clips a length ball off his pads to midwicket where Bailey dives to his right and prevents the ball from passing him
stays in his crease and opens the face to play the ball to third man
good length and angled in, Kohli does not quite connect with a flick and tickles it to the leg side for one
nice and full outside off, forward and pushed back to the bowler
back of a length, turned to square leg for one
too straight in line, worked to the midwicket region
tight line around off, Rohit drops it defensively onto the pitch off the front foot
full and on middle, Rohit walks across off and helps it to long leg
short, aiming for the top of off, chopped towards point
banged in short and outside off, Rohit drags a pull over square leg. Rohit shows intent and scampers across for the second run
dug in short and close to the off stump again, the batsman is up on his tippy toes, riding it down to third man
full and slanting away outside off, Kohli sits back, late-dabs it down to third man
pitched further up and outside off, front-foot drive into short cover, where Smith throws himself to his right to make a smart stop
back of a length and on middle, punchily driven to mid-on
full and outside off, smoothly driven through cover
shortish and outside off, Rohit hops and dabs it down to third man. He opens 2016 with a fluent fifty
back of a length and hint of extra bounce outside off. Kohli seeks to dab it down to third man now. No dice. This ball was closer to the off stump
full and bang on the off stump, Kohli strides forward and pushes it down the ground
more lift in the channel outside off, Kohli respects it and shoulders arms
good length and outside off, drop-and-run single into the covers. Kohli calls for it and beats the throw
pitched up and outside off, drilled to mid-off, where Warner makes a half-save
bouncer angled outside off, Rohit does not shy away from the pull. He sends it over the leaping keeper off a top edge
short and on off, Rohit gets across in defence
back of a length and around off, back-cut neatly to third man
rising ball on middle, Kohli rises with it and diffuses it onto the pitch
bouncer angled across Kohli with more sting. Kohli drops his wrists and lets it fizz through to Wade
pitched up and around off, flicked through square leg. 100 up for India
short and aimed at top of off, punchily played to cover
another bumpy short ball just a shade outside off, Kohli swivels on the back foot, rolls his wrists and pulls it towards deep midwicket
dug in shorter again, this one is chopped behind to Wade
length and outside off, keeps a touch low. Kohli stoops and blocks it towards square point
full and outside off, bunted to mid-on for a quick single. Warner is eager to throw the stumps down, but ends up conceding an overthrow
tossed up and full, patted to the leg side on the front foot
pushed through, Rohit dances out and quitely blocks it in front of cover
slides on off at 90ks, dabbed towards midwicket. There is a mix-up. Kohli sets off for a single, Rohit sends him back rather late. Kohli manages to reach the safety of his crease
darted outside off, punched past the covers
hurled flat, punched down the ground
non-turning ball outside off, pushed past cover
pitched up and outside off, tapped to short cover
back of a length and on off, dabbed towards point
pitched up and on off, Rohit picks it up and launches it over cow corner for a six!
Rohit stays back, rides the bounce of this short ball and secures a single to third man
full and outside off, Kohli comes forward and eases it to cover
lifting short ball on a fourth-stump line, Kohli hops and fends it back to the bowler
skiddy ball on off, defended to the leg side
full and on off, knocked to midwicket, where the fielder dives to his left to stop the ball
slides on, chopped off the off stump fine of the keeper on the off side
drifting down leg, helped to long leg with a sweep
fired down leg as Maxi beats Kohli's sweep. Wide
Kohli twirls his wrists and flicks but can't beat square leg
heading down leg again, paddled very fine on the leg side
back of a length and outside off, punched past point
dug in outside off, glided to third man
back of a length and extra bounce outside off, beats Rohit's cute little dab
short on off, Rohit hops and nurdles it square on the leg side
back of a length and on off, chopped to point, where Maxi runs in, swoops down on the ball, and prevents the single
length and outside off, played towards point. Maxi is lurking there... and India wont take him on
Rohit brings this right out of the top draw! Flighted and outside off, Rohit likes the flight. He steps out and lofts it down the ground
fired outside off, flayed to short cover. The fielder feels the heat
drifting down leg, helped fine
defended back to the bowler
tossed up on the leg stump, Kohli goes low now and sweeps it with good control over backward square leg
fired flat and quick, Kohli gets an inside edge onto the sweep for a couple
Hazlewood tests the batsman with a bouncer outside off, it boings off the surface. Rohit rocks his head out of the way
back of a length and on off, played back to the bowler
banged in outside off, miscued pull to midwicket
keeps it short and outside off, Rohit leans back but can't ramp it down to third man
short and outside off, chopped down to third man
back of a length and on off, dropped defensively onto the pitch
dug in and angling away, dabbed to third man
full and aimed at off, bunted to short midwicket. A fumble there gives India the second run
short and outside off, controlled pull to deep midwicket
lifter angled away outside off, Rohit sways his upper body out of the way
dug in short, but not have enough pace to pose a threat. 127.7ks. Pulled away behind square. Rohit runs across for the second
full and on middle, Rohit comes halfway forward and blocks it back to the bowler
a touch too full and outside off, Kohli laces it to short cover. The ball bursts through the hands of the fielder
picked away off the pads to long leg
short ball on middle, Kohli shuffles inside the line and tucks it through backward square leg for two
too straight in line again, glanced to long leg
good length and on off, stops on the batsman. Popped in front of mid-on
back of a length and outside off, slashed past cover
back of a length and on off, blocked to midwicket
short and angling away, Rohit ramps it over the keeper. Nicely played
short and on middle, poked to leg in front of square
back of a length and strikes the pad as Rohit does not connect with a flick
overpitched and outside off, Rohit belts it to mid-off
shortish, chopped from off stump to third man
pitched up and on off, flicked to deep square
dug in short and down the leg side, Kohli swivels and pulls it over long leg. He gets to his first fifty in ODIs v Australia in Australia
shortish and outside off, chopped towards point
back of a length and on off, blocked with a dead-straight bat on the front foot
pitched up and on off, flicked through square leg. Neatly done
full and on middle, Rohit sits back and nudges a single towards the square leg region
full and on off, Rohit pushes it solidly to mid-off on the front foot
back of a length, tucks Rohit up for room. Blocked onto the pitch
short and rises to catch Rohit in a tangle. He is pinged on the body
dug in shortish, Rohit now connects with a pull. Rolls his wrists and plays to deep midwicket
back of a length on off, tucked to midwicket
short and angled away, guided to third man
length ball on off, Kohli targets covers with a drive but checks his shot and skews it to leg off the inside half
short and width outside off, Kohli frees his arms and cuts it uppishly over point
back of a length and on off, Rohit goes back and works one past midwicket
might have been a slower ball outside off, steered to backward point, where Maxi dives to his left and stops the ball
back of a length and outside off, Rohit throws his bat at it and drags it past the stumps, behind square on the leg side
shortish and outside off, Kohli runs it down to third man
full and on the pads from over the wicket, clipped past midwicket
pitched up and angling away outside off, steered to third man
slanted onto the pads again, picked away past midwicket again
full and on off, Rohit drills it down the ground. Simply belted that, forcing the bowler and umpire to take evasive action
Paris shortens his length and keeps Rohit to a defence
glanced off the hips to long leg
slower ball on a good length outside off, defended on the front foot
short of a length outside off, Rohit jumps back and cuts, Maxwell dives to his left at point to save runs
full delivery outside off, Rohit leans forward and drives through cover to move on to 99
a full ball outside off, Kohli leans forward and drives the ball through cover
good length and straight, Rohit gets behind the line and defends to the bowler
slower ball outside off, the cheers build up to a crescendo and then subside as Rohit defends towards point, the players will break for drinks
a length ball on the pads, a no-no when fine leg is in the circle, Kohli glances Paris between the keeper and short fine leg for four more
a fuller length on middle and off, Kohli pushes forward and punches to long off, and the crowd begins to chant Rohit's name again ...
happy New Year, Rohit Sharma! He gets there with a steer to third man, and looks up to the skies as he runs the single. Takes off his helmet and raises his bat to the cheering crowd at the WACA
steered to this man off the back foot
pushes away from his body at a good length ball that slants across the right-hander from over the wicket, he's beaten
shoddy fielding from the man at point, was it Finch? Rohit got on the front foot to square drive and the fielder sort of dived over the ball
leans forward and clips the length ball in front of square leg
good length outside off, moves forward and punches the ball into the covers
leans on to the front foot and drives to mid on
length ball on middle and leg, Kohli stays back and tucks the ball off his pads through square leg
a full ball on the pads, Rohit chips the ball over midwicket for a single
short of a length outside off, Kohli stays back and guides the ball to third man
good length, bounces a bit more and hits Kohli on the thigh as he decides to defend from the crease
dabbed off the back foot towards third man
defended from the crease towards the bowler

that is a tremendous blow! The ball is full and straight, no lateral movement at all, Rohit strides forward and frees his arms with a mighty swing, sending the ball into the crowd beyond long on , India are past 200
pushed from the crease on the leg side
Rohit chops the short of length ball on to his boot as he was trying to steer to third man, the ball goes on the off side and he hobbles the single
moves forward and across to work the ball off his pads to midwicket
he tees off again! Rohit plants his foot forward and lofts a full ball to the wide mid-on boundary, he's simply hitting through the line
full and on the pads this time, horrible line, Rohit moves across and glances fine enough to beat fine leg, hyperspace time?
played into the leg side off the front foot
Boland is known to have a good yorker and there's one of them, the heavy ball thudding into the blockhole on middle stump, Rohit defends
misses the yorker this time, and Rohit flicks the full toss off his pads with superb wristwork, he's hit it wide enough to beat long leg
the bouncer, Kohli tries to hook but is beaten
short of a length just outside off, Kohli stays back and opens the face to steer to third man
short of a length angling into the right-hander, nudged from the crease towards midwicket
steered to third man again
a fuller ball, a slower ball, pushed off the front foot on the leg side for a single
short ball, Kohli tries to pull again but is beaten
so deft from Rohit, pushes forward and then transfers weight back as the short of a length ball comes at him, opens the face late to play the ball fine of third man for four more
cut off the back foot but can't beat the man at point
hangs back and steers the ball to third man once again
moves back and across to work a short of a length ball off his hips but misses and gets hit on the thigh, the ball drops at his feet
short and wide outside off, Kohli carves it over cover, didn't time that well though
backs away and tries to heave a good length ball over the leg side, the bottom hand comes off the bat and the ball bounces towards midwicket
backs away towards leg stump, the ball is short and just outside off, Kohli slaps it through covers and pierces the gap in the deep
ducks under the bouncer but then decides to try and ramp it while down on his knees over the keeper, he misses
another bouncer, this time Kohli does not need to duck because it lobs high over his head
shot! Jumps out of his crease to get to the pitch of a length ball and lofts it flat over the infield at cover, that's inside out ad in the gap
nudged towards midwicket for a single to bring up the 200 partnership off 218 balls
tries to work the ball square but it falls near his feet off the bottom edge, they run a quick single
good length and straight, defended from the crease back down the pitch
good length and straight in the channel outside off, driven on the up but doesn't find the gap at mid off
short ball, Rohit goes back to pull but mis-times it to midwicket
worked off the pads behind square
backs away towards leg and taps the ball behind point for a single
look at the bounce on that ball! It leaps from short short of a length outside off and the batsman just manages to pull his bat inside the line of the ball
tucked off the pads through square leg for a single
a fuller length outside off, Rohit reaches for it and is beaten, Faulkner bowled that from around the wicket
Rohit charges and aims a loft down the ground, he's not timed this well at all and the ball falls safely just beyond the circle at mid-off

Kohli's hit that hard off the front foot, he's hit that flat, and the ball is headed over the long-on boundary but Finch runs to his left and takes the catch at head height. Kohli falls close to his hundred after an outstanding partnership. He's set India up for a huge total, but can the remaining batsmen hit from the get-go? Kohli timed that really well, just did not hit it high enough
short of a length outside off from around the wicket, Dhoni stays in his crease and chops it into the off side
short ball outside leg stump from over the wicket, Dhoni swivels on the back foot and pulls his second ball to the fine leg boudnary
fuller length on the pads, Dhoni flicks behind square
an appeal for a caught behind but the umpire says not out! Dhoni tried to pull a short of a length ball angling down leg side and missed, that brushed the thigh pad on its way through to Wade
dabbed through square leg for a single
short of a length with extra bounce outside off, Rohit jumps back and ramps it towards the fielder at third man
played to point where Finch fumbles, Dhoni is quick to pounce on the mistake and race back for the second
driven through the covers from the crease
short of a length outside off, cut down to third man for a single
backs away towards leg, the bowler follows him from around the wicket, denying the batsman room, Rohit plays towards point

that's in the crowd over long off! I don't think Dhoni middled this but such is the power and the velocity of his swing that it's good enough, he charged out of his crease and swung hard at a length ball
played into the off side
short of a length at he body, Dhoni swivels and pulls behind square
short ball down leg side, that's a wide
shot! Moves across his stumps towards the off side, gets down low and paddle-scoops the full ball to the fine leg boundary, there was a fielder in the deep but it was too fine for him to reach
tucked off the pads gently through square leg, superbly run
Boland bowls one of those yorkers he is known for, Dhoni plays it out towards long on
misses the yorker this time, it's a low full toss, Rohit waits in his crease, bends a little to get under the ball and heaves it over deep midwicket, that's in the crowd
reaches forward and away from his body to drive a full ball through covers, 150 for Rohit, a superb innings, chanceless
hits the yorker this time, Dhoni digs it out through midwicket
he bowls yorkers to Dhoni and misses them against Rohit, another low full toss, Rohit gets under it again and lofts it cleanly over wide long on
this time he nails the yorker, Rohit stoops and digs it out on the off side for a single
a length ball angling into him from around the wicket, pulled to wide long on

this is a superb catch from the debutant! Dhoni rocked back to the short ball and pulled hard, hitting the ball out of the middle. The ball was flying quickly to Boland's right and was nearly past him when he stuck out his right hand and grabbed it
Jadeja's nailed his first ball, the length was full and he slammed it off the front foot to the wide long on boundary
full and wide outside off, Jadeja reaches for it and chops the ball behind point, they are sprinting between the wickets, insane speed and they come back for the third
backs away towards leg and pushes the ball into the covers for a quick single
full and wide outside off, Jadeja drives through covers and keeps the strike
nearly in the blockhole, Jadeja drives to long off for a single

Over the keeper! Rohit got down low to sweep a low full toss from outside off stump, that ball flew off the back of the bat and bounced inches before the boundary before going over, that was nearly a six!

misses the yorker again to Rohit, who is ready and waiting, he got under the ball and lofted it high and far over the wide long on boundary. Rohit was deep in his crease as he hit that. He swung with such power that he's broken his bat and needs a new one
in the blockhole this time, Rohit stays back and drives to long off for a single
in the blockhole again, driven past the bowler for a single
in the blockhole outside off to finish the innings, Rohit tries to play on the off side but gets an inside edge on to the leg, India have made 61 off the last five overs
dug in short on middle from over the wicket, smartly pulled down to long leg
short again, 133ks, Finch brings out the pull again. Rolls his wrists and hits it behind square again
full and angled in, Warner defends on the front foot
pitched further up, no swing or seam movement outside off, crisp drive to mid-off
short, skiddy ball at 138ks, Warner has no room to play with. He fends it rather awkwardly to the leg side
veering onto the pads, tickled behind square
full and aimed at off at 129ks, pushed back to the bowler on the front foot
pitched up on a fourth-stump line, 136ks, played back to the bowler
pushed down the leg side, Bhuvneshwar beats Finch's flick. Wide called
back of a length and outside off, Finch chases it with a cut and misses
too full and straight, clipped to Ashwin at square leg
pitched up and holds its line outside off. Finch decides not to chase this. Left alone
shortish and on the hips, deflected in front of Ashwin at square leg
good length and angled across off at 136ks, Finch watches it through to the keeper
back of a length and cuts back into the right-hander. Finch chops his bat down and drags it past the off stump via an inside edge

sharp return catch! Maiden international wicket for Sran in his second over. He is mobbed by his team-mates. Subdued celebrations overall. Sran lands it full and outside off at 136.5ks, Finch wants to drill a drive, but the bat twists in his hand. He hits it back to the bowler. Sran gets both hands to his right and hangs onto the catch
back of a length and angled away, guided past backward point for one
sliding into middle and leg, glanced away fine on the leg side off the pads
length and outside off, square driven to point
Manish dives to his left at short cover to intercept this drive from Smith
short, rising ball outside off at 137ks, makes Warner hop and defend
length and outside off, square-driven again. Point makes a half save
short down leg, left alone. Wide
back of a length and outside off, punched past backward point, to the right of Umesh at deep third man
width outside off, carved away to third man
back of a length and on middle, cramps Warner for room. Poked back to the bowler
pitched up and angled away, Smith reaches out and plays away from the body. Driven to short cover
short at 136ks, squares up the batsman and finds the outside edge. Squirted to point
keeps it short, this one is measured at 133ks, swivel pulled with good control to long leg

make that two in two overs for Sran! He roars and pumps his fist as Warner exits. This was no subdued celebration. Full and outside off again, at 137,2ks, this time to the left hander. Warner looks to loft it over mid-off. He does not get hold of it; Kohli completes the overhead catch

an appeal for caught behind, not given. Short and down the leg side, Bailey seeks to glance it away. Replays show that Bailey had gloved that. Dhoni goes low and takes the catch. He hardly appealed, though. That could have been three in two overs for the left-arm pacer. Umpire Kettleborough wasn't interested.. Hot spot picks up a mark as well
full and angling away outside off, left alone
flicked through backward square leg for one
bouncer at 136ks, sails over to the keeper. Wide called for height
back of a length and outside off, punchily played to cover
sliding into the hips, Bailey misses the flick but Australia get a leg bye
full and outside off, square-driven. There men coverage on the ball and keep it to two
another bumper from Bhuvneshwar. Too high, again
good length and on middle, chipped in front of midwicket
back of a length, blocked back to the bowler
pitched up and outside off, Kohli throws himself to his right at mid-off and stops that drive
short and makes the batsman hop and fend
full and angled across off, Bailey lets it pass
straight in line, tucked behind square as Bailey stays in the crease
pitched up and aimed at off, driven back at the bowler
short and attacking the body, pulled uppishly, one bounce to Rahane at leg-gully

chance for a run out. Full and on the stumps, driven down the ground, Bhuvneshwar goes low to his right, deflects it to mid-on. Brief hesitation between the wickets.The fielder fails to throw the stumps down at the bowler's end. And Dhoni wasn't upto the stumps to collect the ball at his end and take the bails off
back of a length, defended to the off stump
similar length, punched to mid-on
full and outside off, driven into the covers
banged in short, pulled away in the air to the right of square leg
back of a length and outside off, jabbed to cover
full and angled away outside off, mis-hit drive back to the bowler
length and on a fourth-stump line, dabbed to cover for a well-judged, quick one
slanted across off on a fuller length. No shot offered
back of a length and outside off, Bailey answers with a solid punch to cover
short and rises outside off, flat-batted away past midwicket
full and outside off, pushed to cover
too full and outside off, Bailey leans into a drive and picks the gap between the covers and mid-off
length and outside off, tapped to mid-off
Bailey who is standing outside leg, gets across and plays this full ball back to the bowler
back of a length and outside off, punched to cover
back of a length, guided to backward point
shortish and outside off, punched to the man at mid-off
back of a length and on middle, Smith walks across off and flicks behind square
dug in short and outside off, Bailey rocks back and nails a pull. The man at midwicket (Ashwin) got his hand to it. Yet the ball reached the fence
and again! Bailey takes this short ball from outside off. This sat up and Bailey pulled this strongly behind square
back of a length and outside off, played to cover
Sran errs short and gives room again. Pulled to deep midwicket now
another short one outside off, pulled to long-on
tossed up, driven down the ground
full on middle, knocked to midwicket
Bailey uses his feet and drives it to long-on
dropped short on middle, Smith skips back and pulls to deep midwicket
flighted on middle from round the stumps, Bailey ventures out of the crease, meets the pitch and lifts it straight down the ground. Nice and clean!
nudged off the pads through square leg. Bailey sprints across for the second
back of a length on off at 138ks, turned to the midwicket region
short on off, Umesh hits 140ks. Bailey gets up on his toes and blocks
back of a length and on off, this is one click greater, punched to the off side

Umesh pings Bailey's glove! 142ks, leaps from a length and hustles onto Bailey. He looks to fend it away, but is socked on the glove, the ball rolls away towards point. Bailey calls for the single. He is hurt, but dives full length to make his ground. The fielder did not effect a direct hit, though
back of a length, defended in front of his toes
banged in outside off at 142.6ks, dragged past midwicket with a pull
Smith uses his feet and welcomes Jadeja with a chip over midwicket
fired outside off, pushed to cover
swatted from the off stump to long-on
hit past cover for one
darted short, punched back to the bowler
slides on at 91ks, blocked
rising short ball outside off at 141ks, punched towards backward point
back of a length and on off, Smith hangs back and dabs towards point
Smith walks across the off stump and flicks it to long leg
137ks bouncer, zings over a ducking Bailey to the keeper. Wide called
short and aimed at the top of off, Bailey leaps and punches it crisply to mid-off
full and straight at 141ks, Bailey was late onto the flick after shuffling across. He takes it on the thigh
back of a length and on off, Bailey smartly drops it in front of point and calls Smith though for a quick, quick single
tossed up and drifts in, Kohli dives to his right at mid-off and stops the drive
darted short, punched back at Jadeja
picked away off the hips to backward square leg. Bailey comes back for the second
drifts in flat, inside edged onto the leg side
another non-turning ball, which is driven down the ground
dug in short on off, Smith stands tall and forces it down to long-on
Smith shuffles across off even before Umesh delivers. Pulls this short ball from outside off down to long leg
full and on the stumps, driven to mid-on
full and on off, skewed drive to mid-on off the inside half. A direct hit from Kohli there could have got rid of Bailey
full and heading down leg, beating Smith's flick. Another wide
back of a length and on off, Smith gets behind the line and blocks to cover
short ball on off, stylishly pulled to long leg after shuffling across
back of a length and outside off, guided to third man
goes back to a flat and straight ball and works it off his pads through midwicket
short and wide outside off, no turn, Smith waits on the back foot and cuts late and cuts hard, beats point to his left for four
a full ball seemed to swerve away from Bailey, who swatted it off the front foot to long on
goes back and tucks the ball on the leg side
played into the leg side
pushed off the front foot to long on for a single
punched off the back foot through cover point
steps out of his crease and pushes the ball on the leg side
driven to long off for a single
goes back into his crease and whips the ball off his pads, just a deft stroke but the timing is good and the placement better behind square
driven off the front foot to long on
worked off the pads through midwicket for a single
a full ball on the pads, driven off the front foot through midwicket
flicked off the pads through midwicket again to bring up the 100
driven off the front foot towards long off, an easy two ... runs coming easily now
driven back to the bowler on the front foot
the reverse sweep, and he's hit it through cover! He was well forward as he hit that
picks off another single through midwicket. Nine off this over, after eight each off the previous two
nudged on the front foot towards midwicket, Jadeja races across but can't prevent the single
steps out and picks the ball off his pads in front of square leg for a single
fired down leg side, that's a wide
stays in his crease this time and pushes a flat ball from middle to cover
steps out now and drives the ball past the diving midwicket fielder towards long on
pushed off the back foot gently towards cover point for a single
steps out to get to the pitch of the ball and drives to deep cover, six off this over
steps out of his crease and drives the ball off his pads through midwicket for a single
moves forward and across and punches to long on for a single
pulls the ball behind square, I missed Bailey bringing up his half-century
worked off the pads towards midwicket where the fielder dives to save runs
steps out of his crease to drive a full ball from outside off through cover
strays down leg side, Bailey swivels and swats to deep backward square leg, just five off this over
pushed off the front foot into the gap at cover for another easy single
bowled slowly through the air on off, played with soft hands towards cover for one
nudged with soft hands very close on the leg side for one more, the 100 stand is up
worked off the pads through square leg for one more
dabbed off the front foot behind point, Bailey hesitates but Smith calls him through
played off the back foot behind point, six singles off that over
full on middle and leg, driven off the front foot to long on
leans forward and hits the ball along the ground to long on again
moves forward and drives the ball to long on for the third time in the over, the ball is doing nothing for Ashwin
the carrom ball? Played towards midwicket for no run that time
Bailey compensates for the dot ball by unfurling he reverse sweep, hitting it off the front foot from middle stump behind point for four
steps out of his crease and drives the ball to long on, another eight-run over without sweat
nudged off the pads behind square for ... another single
dabbed off the pads behind square and they run one more, it's a leg bye so Smith stays on 49
pushed off the front foot to long off for a single
pushed with soft hands through cover and Smith raises his bat for a half-century
worked off the pads behind square, short fine leg is on the edge of the circle, so another single
cut off the back foot through point, they run a two to break the uniformity, seven runs off that over
no single this time, Bailey charges Ashwin, gets to the pitch of the ball, and smashes it over the long off boundary with a full and clean swing of the bat
worked off the pads towards short fine leg
Smith steps out and flicks the ball off his pads through square leg
short and wide outside off, cut off the back foot to deep point
huge over for Australia, short and wide outside off, Smith goes back and cuts hard, in front of point this time for four, Ashwin looks so helpless here
and it gets better for Australia! Smith charges, gets to the pitch of the ball and lofts dead straight, that's behind the sightscreen
good length and straight, driven back to the bowler
short of a length outside off, cut off the back foot but bottom edged towards point
short of a length outside off, Smith moves back and steers the ball behind point
short of a length and straight, short-arm pulled behind square after swivelling in his crease
good length angling into off stump, slower ball too at 121 kph, defended into the off side
waits on the back foot and plays a punchy square drive behind point for two more
a full ball on off stump, driven along the ground to long off for a single
reaches for the full and wide ball outside off and drives to cover
driven hard off the front foot, but can't beat cover this time
pushed back to the bowler, in the air for it bit but it bounces short of him, the ball deflects off his hand over the stumps at the bowler's end
driven off the back foot through deep cover
reaches forward and away from his body and drives a full ball to deep cover
good length outside off, defended back to the bowler
short and wide outside off, cut hard off the back foot, Ashwin fumbles at point
good length just outside off, Smith goes back and defends towards cover
a half-volley on the pads, Smith whips from his crease, sending the ball skidding across the grass to deep square leg
that bouncer is too high to escape the umpire's notice
turned off the pads to long leg for a single
punched off the back foot through point
a full and friendly ball on off stump, driven off the front foot back to the bowler, Kohli can't stop it cleanly and deflects it towards extra cover
driven to long on for a single
that's only 96 kph, Bailey was on the front foot too early and then defended it to the bowler
that's so short and such a gentle pace, it sits up for Bailey who can't have got many easier balls that that in his career, he pulls with power to the midwicket boundary
driven to long off for a single
driven off the front foot to extra cover for a single
steps out to a gentle delivery and drives to long on
short and wide outside off, goes on the back foot and cuts behind point
pushed off the back foot through point
goes back and defends the ball on the leg side
pushed off the front foot into the covers
nudged off the front foot close on the leg side. Dhoni scampers towards square leg to save the single
drifts on to the pads, worked in front of square leg for a single
goes back into his crease and turns the ball through square leg, another drop into Australia's ocean

it's all happening now! The paddle sweep results in a top edge, but it falls short of short fine leg. The fielder rips the throw to Dhoni who lets the ball go through between his legs and hit the stumps. He was standing in front of the stumps. Smith was easily safe though
normal service resumes, short and wide outside off, Smith goes back and cuts through cover and finds the gap on the boundary
played back to the bowler
goes back to punch the ball on the off side and gets an inside edge on to the pad
played back to the bowler
nudged off the pads behind square for a single
pushed off the front foot through point for another single
dabbed with soft hands wide of short third man for a single
short ball, on leg stump too, Smith stays back and pulls the ball behind square, poor line, poor length
steps out of his crease to whip the ball off his toes through square, Australia cruise to 200
an appeal for lbw as the batsman tries to work the ball through the leg side but misses and gets hit on the pad, that may have been missing leg
short ball, swivels and pulls behind square for a single
short of a length and wide outside off, Bailey slashes and misses
good length just outside off, stays back in his crease and punches the ball towards point
short of a length outside off, pushed off the back foot to point
just two runs of that over, turned off the pads for a single to long leg to finish it
tries to turn the ball on the leg side but gets an edge that drops on the off side, they still run a single, the fielders in the circle are deep
a full ball outside off, driven hard off the front foot, mid-off does well to dive to his left and stop the ball, it rolls away from him a little and they steal a second
length and on the pads, glanced to fine leg and the running is so intense between the wickets
short ball, Bailey jumps back and across and pulls in front of square
stays back to a length ball outside off and dabs it late behind the diving fielder at point
driven off the front foot towards midwicket
a fullish ball on the pads, Smith moves across his stumps and flicks the ball through square leg

that's his 100! Well played George Bailey, he had a reprieve first ball and he's made it count. He gets there by dropping the ball close on the off side for a single to move to 99, the bowler gets to the ball and throws at the striker's end and concedes the overthrow
dropped with soft hands for another single on the off side
driven from the crease to cover
backs away towards the leg side and square drives the ball with power off his stumps to point, where Rohit dives to his left to save a boundary
moves back and across and defends the ball on the leg side, only four runs off that over
short of a length and straight, gets off his toes and swats the ball through square leg
a length ball on off stump, Smith moves a touch to leg, exposing all three stumps and dabs the ball behind point, such shots are possible only when there is zero lateral movement
defended hard into the pitch, the ball bounces high over the stumps to Dhoni and they run a single even now, before Dhoni can't get to the ball
reaches for the ball outside off and drives the ball behind point
a real effort ball, the bouncer climbs on Smith who lean back and tries to ramp it over the keeper, he misses
tries to heave a length ball across the line and misses and gets hit on the thigh, are Australia making their acceleration now?
back of a length, Smith aims to clip it away to the leg side but only manages an inside edge
back of a length, tucks Bailey up for room. Blocked to the leg side
back of a length on middle, turned through square leg. There is the 200-run stand. Another milestone ticked off
dug in short, Smith is quick to latch onto the pull, pulling behind square, beating Umesh in the deep
full and on off, Smith shuffles across and whips through backward square leg for only <s>one</s>. No back up for the throw, sloppy stuff for India. They get two
back of a length and on off, Smith hangs back and glides a single down to third man
Smith brings up a century of his own. He raises his bat and is embraced by his partner. Pitched up on off, the skip skips across off and clips it fine on the leg side
short and width outside off, Bailey pounces on it, flaying it past point for four
short and just a shade outside off, chopped behind point for one now
back of a length and on off, Smith gets forward and across as he pushes it to mid-on
Smith makes room outside leg, the bowler goes full on middle, drilled down the ground. Ashwin dives to his left at mid-on. The effort ends in vain

back of a length, Smith jumps outside leg again. He swings hard and gets a thick inside edge that runs away past the leg stump for the third four of the over. Looks like Australia have kicked into a higher gear
back of a length and angling away, dabbed to third man
Smith beats mid-on to his left again! Banged in short and outside off, Smith loads up and swings it away for four! He reaches his career-best ODI score now
back of a length, Smith shuffles across and lobs the ball in front of midwicket
slower ball at 94ks, he generates some extra bounce as well. The batsman is surprised as he yanks his bottom hand off the bat and defends
shortish and outside off, played to backward point
Bailey runs down the pitch again, Sran bangs it short. It gets big on Bailey, but he manages to swat it behind square on the off side
pushed through on middle, check-driven back to the bowler
straight ball, punched crisply to long-off
Bang! Tossed up, Smith steps out and launches it straight down the ground with great authority
fired short, punched back to the bowler
short and width outside off, Smith now employs a cut and sends it past backward point
Smith goes low and laps this off-stump ball towards fine leg
carrom ball? Darted wide down the leg side as the batsman steps out. Dhoni can't gather cleanly
width outside off, cut to backward point
slides on, tapped in front of cover
Bailey uses his feet and flicks to midwicket
skids on leg from round the wicket, punched back as Ashwin dives to his right and stops the ball

And Ashwin has broken past the pair. Tossed up and outside off, Bailey dances out and lifts it... Bhuvneshwar runs across to his right from long-off, goes for the catch with both hands. The ball bobbles out but he manages to secure it on the rebound. Bailey acknowledges the cheers as he walks back
hurled on middle, punched down the ground
full and angling away outside off, solid drive to long-on
short and on middle and leg, Maxi swivels and pulls down to long leg
bouncer outside off, slower loopy one. Smith drops his hands on it. Wide
back of a length and outside off, hit to cover
94ks slower ball heading down the leg side, diverted to the left of Dhoni
full and outside off at 117ks, tricks the batsman into playing early. Driven off the inside edge, lobs over the stumps
length ball on off, Maxi moves forward and runs it towards backward point
flighted on off, defended back to the bowler
poked back to the bowler again
Maxi makes room outside the leg stump, Ashwin follows him. Slaps it away through the covers. Not the back away look away cut.. Maxi did follow the ball there

Maxi skips out to his tossed-up ball. He heaves it in the air. Dhawan runs to his right from long-on and settles under it. Good catch, that. Ashwin has another. Perhaps it's all to little and too late for India
flat and outside off, punched to backward point
flighted and outside off, front-foot drive to cover
slower-ball bouncer outside off, another ball that loops over to Dhoni. Add another wide to the total
dug in outside off at 118ks, Smith hangs back, waits for it to arrive and pulls to deep midwicket
short ball on middle at normal pace, pulled to deep midwicket
95ks, floaty full toss on off,  smoothly pushed to long-off
short and angled away outside off, Marsh rides the bounce and back-cuts it through backward point
full and width outside off, laced past backward point for another four. And Smith has a word with a debutant
pitched up and outside off, eased to deep cover now
shortish offbreak, punched to long-off
pushed through from round the stumps, Smith targets the leg side and nearly pops a return catch off a leading edge
flicked away through backward square leg for a couple
slides on off, chopped towards cover
down the pitch and bunted down to long-on
the batsman skips out, meets it on the full and drives it past the diving Ashwin
full and on off, whipped down to long-on. Smith wants two but has to settle with one
back of a length and zipping through outside off, beats the cut
full and on middle, hoicked through midwicket off an inside edge
Smith hangs back, then shuffles across and clips it behind square
banged in short, hurries onto Marsh. He sends it flying over midwicket off a top edge
slow yorker, dips on off at 117ks, dug out to the leg side
full ball outside off, slower at 110ks, pushed to midwicket. Ashwin throws himself to his left and stops the ball
back of a length, extra bounce outside off. Cut and a miss. Smith is frustrated
dug in short and outside off, beautifully punched behind point. Sran runs across from sweeper cover, slides, and hauls the ball in
short ball outside off, flayed past cover
Bhuvneshwar sucks pace off this again. 117ks short ball, the batsman waits and punches it down to long-on
short ball on off, chopped down to short third man
short ball down leg, Marsh shapes to pull but does not connect properly. Toe-ends it behind square
back of a length and may have been just a shade outside off, Smith hops and is smacked on the thigh
short ball outside off, cut to third man
shortish and outside off, punched to Jadeja at backward point
full and on middle, Smith, who was deep in the crease, whips to deep midwicket
Umesh nails an inswinging yorker, Marsh jams his bat down hurriedly
Smith falls one short of 150. Sran tricks Smith with a slower ball outside off. He is early into the drive and spoons it into the lap of Kohli at short cover
Faulkner nips down the track, Sran floats another back-of-the-hand slower ball down the leg side
Australia gun down 310, the highest successful chase at the WACA! Full and on off, punched down to long-on. Faulkner finishes it off
